cast.original_title: 青春ブタ野郎はゆめみる少女の夢を見ない
cast.overview: In Fujisawa, Sakuta Azusagawa is in his second year of high school. Blissful days with his girlfriend and upperclassman, Mai Sakurajima, are interrupted by the appearance of his first crush, Shoko Makinohara.
cast.title: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl

details.biography: Shoko Yuzuki (柚木 尚子, Yuzuki Shōko, born on July 4th) is a Japanese voice actress. She is 153 cm tall and her blood type is O. She graduated from Rams Training Center RPE and Video Techno Academia. Previously affiliated with Spellbound, in April 2020, after a four-year custody period, he was promoted to Kenyu Office associate affiliation. She was a member of GARNET STAR.
details.name: Shoko Yuzuki
